channel.title: Game Jam on Fraser McCann
channel.description: Recent content in Game Jam on Fraser McCann

item.title: Fishyphus
item.description:
Creepy fishing simulator where you collect wacky items forever


Created for for AGDS Spooky Jam 2024

item.title: Greatest of All Turtle
item.description:
A platformer where you can use your past self to get a leg up!

Jump on your corpses to succeed!


Created for AGDS Freshers Jam 2022

item.title: Inpatient
item.description:
Psychological horror game over multiple days with the player slowly giving away parts of themselves.


Created for AGDS Spooky Jam 2023

item.title: Rob-Bot
item.description:
Silly heist game where you control a robot dog through security cameras!


Created for AGDS Fresher Jam 2023

item.title: Touching the Moai is Forbidden
item.description:
Satirical horror based on 2010s viral hits.

Escape a creepy island while hunted by an evil Moai statue.


Created for AGDS Spooky Jam 2022

item.title: Vanishing Act
item.description:
PSX Survival horror with a spatial inventory.

Play as a witch performing a ritual to escape a monstrous federal agent!


Created for AGDS Freshers Jam 2024
